###In-line Approach
1) mpg~cyl+wt
```{r, include=TRUE}
x1<-lm(mpg~cyl+wt, data = mtcars)
summary(x1)
```
2) mpg~cyl+wt+am
```{r, include=TRUE}
x2<-lm(mpg~cyl+wt+am, data = mtcars)
summary(x2)
```
3) mpg~cyl+wt+hp+qsec
```{r, include=TRUE}
x3<-lm(mpg~cyl+wt+hp+qsec, data = mtcars)
summary(x3)
```


###for loop
```{r,include=TRUE}
varlist<-c(mpg~cyl+wt, mpg~cyl+wt+am, mpg~cyl+wt+hp+qsec)
for (i in varlist) {
  print(i)
  print(summary(lm(i,data = mtcars)))
  
}
```
